Hero.description: I am a talented web developer from Moscow. I create beautiful and accessible websites that make money. I have over 4 years of coding experience and have worked on several projects.
Hero.heading: Mikhail Gostev
Hero.feature-3-description: Following the latest trends in dev

JobExperience.heading: Job experience
JobExperience.paragraph1: Roistat is a business analytics platform that helps track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.
JobExperience.paragraph2: During 1 years and 4 months at the company, I had the following responsibilities:
JobExperience.image-alt: A man sitting on a stack of books

FeaturedProject.heading: Featured project
FeaturedProject.paragraph1: Nerif is a continuation of my project, which I started in 2020. At that time, I saw myself in Data Science and began developing an algorithm that would predict the results of CS:GO matches.
FeaturedProject.paragraph2: Although the algorithm was not successful, I decided to imagine what would happen if it were. So I made a full-fledged website in the form of a SaaS platform with regular predictions, success tracking, etc.
FeaturedProject.image-alt: Mobile and desktop presentation of Nerif

SoftSkills.heading: Soft skills
SoftSkills.subheading: Team player and a social butterfly
SoftSkills.paragraph1: I tutored English and computer science in my first year of university, and I still haven't lost interest in <highlight>teaching</highlight>. I love sharing my knowledge, and I'm good at it.
SoftSkills.paragraph2: I'm a fan of board games and I play them constantly, both with friends and with strangers. In addition, I host board game events, which requires me to be <highlight>responsible</highlight>, show <highlight>leadership</highlight> qualities, and excel at finding common ground with different people.

Contact.heading: Contact
Contact.paragraph1: I am looking for a full-time job. I am also always happy to meet new people and participate in awesome projects.
Contact.paragraph2: I look forward to meeting you! You can send me an email or fill out a form.
Contact.contact-form-send-error: There was an error sending your message.
